form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: UPDATE: On Thursday, April 9, 2020, Governor Wolf announced that Pennsylvania schools will remain closed for the rest of the 2019-2020 academic year. All facilities are closed until further notice. All events are cancelled or postponed until further notice.

The Districts Technology Department has established a technology support hotlinefor students only at412-264-3013. The helpline will be staffed Monday through Friday, 10 a.m. 2 p.m. during the closure. All calls received outside of this time frame will be recorded and returned in the order in which they were received.

a.title: District TV Series: 'Half Hour, Full Moon'

li.a: District TV Series: 'Half Hour, Full Moon'

div.span: On April 9, 2020, Pennsylvania Governor Tom Wolf announced that the school closure will extend to the end of the academic year.
Due to Governor Wolf's "stay at home" order, the Moon Area Middle School cheer try outs for the 2020-2021 school year will now be conducted virtually.

div.a: MASD Receives 2020 Best in Communities for Music Education Designation

div.span: Moon Area School District has been named a 2020 Best in Communities for Music Education for the seventh consecutive year!

div.a: MASD Announces New Digital Learning Resource: 'Clever'

div.span: We are pleased to announce that we will be using Clever as our digital learning portal!
If you are in need of obtaining food during the COVID-19 crisis, eligible families may utilize one of the local free food distribution centers.

div.a: Video Message from Mr. Balaski - COVID-19 Update: 3/20/2020

div.span: Please read the latest update from MASD regarding the COVID-19 closure.

a.title: Board of Education Workshop Meeting/Education, Policy, Finance, and Facilities Committees Meetings - Virtual Meeting
a.span: Board of Education Workshop Meeting/Education, Policy, Finance, and Facilities Committees Meetings - Virtual Meeting

p.em: Update: Due to the COVID-19 school closure, the Kindergarten Registration Round-Up event scheduled for April 28, 2020, has been canceled and will not be rescheduled. Also, all Transition Events are canceled and will not be rescheduled.

span.p: MAHS College and Career Counselor, Ms. Julie Sitko, is partnering with PHEAA (Pennsylvania Higher Education Assistance Agency) to host a virtual financial aid night on Tuesday, April 28 from 6:30-7:30 for families and students in grades 9-11.
Families wishing to participate may sign up here::https://pheaa-events500.webex.com/pheaa-events500/onstage/g.php?MTID=e9170f72a887840c38742d77c315466e8
Or call in with this number:1-650-479-3207Call-in toll number (US/Canada)

ul.li: If you know of a Moon Area School District employee who has done an exceptional job and deserves recognition, please email npompeani@moonarea.net and we will let both the employee and their supervisor know of their hard work and dedication!

div.h1: Equal Opportunity and Title IX Statement

div.p: Moon Area School District (MASD) does not discriminate in its educational programs, activities or employment practices based on race, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, disability, age, religion, ancestry, genetic information or any other legally-protected category. Announcement of this policy is in accordance with State Law including the Pennsylvania Human Relations Act and with Federal law, including Title VI and Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972, Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 and the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990. For more information, please contact the Title IX Coordinator, Amy Finnegan, at 8353 University Boulevard, Moon Township, PA 15108 or 412-264-9440 x1125.
